item.title: The old woman's song
item.summary: The old woman sings about the Hyena who carried her off, and how she sprang aside when he tried to throw her onto a pointed rock, so that he instead fell onto the pointed rock and was killed.
item.comments: 1) See also The old woman and the hyena and Old woman's song (2nd version), 2) This story is found in Book I- 2
item.author: |a!kunta (Stoffel) (I)

keyword.subkw: the old woman and the hyena
